verses.verse: I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with my whole <S%H3820>heart.<s%> I will <S%H5608>tell<s%> of all your marvelous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
I will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and <S%H5970>rejoice<s%> in <S%H2167>you.<s%> I will sing praise to your <S%H8034>name,<s%> O Most <S%H5945>High.<s%>
When my <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back,<s%> they <S%H3782>stumble<s%> and <S%H6>perish<s%> in your <S%H6440>presence.<s%>
For you have <S%H6213>maintained<s%> my <S%H4941>just<s%> <S%H1779>cause.<s%> You <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H8199>judging<s%> <S%H6664>righteously.<s%>

You have <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> You have <S%H6>destroyed<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%> You have blotted <S%H4229>out<s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

The <S%H341>enemy<s%> is <S%H2723>overtaken<s%> by <S%H5331>endless<s%> <S%H8552>ruin.<s%> The very <S%H2143>memory<s%> of <S%H1992>the<s%> <S%H6145>cities<s%> which you have <S%H5428>overthrown<s%> has <S%H6>perished.<s%>
But <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3427>reigns<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> He has <S%H3559>prepared<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> He will administer <S%H1777>judgment<s%> to the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> in <S%H4339>uprightness.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will also be a high <S%H4869>tower<s%> for the <S%H1790>oppressed;<s%> a high <S%H4869>tower<s%> in <S%H6256>times<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble.<s%>
Those who <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> will put their <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>you,<s%> for you, Yahweh, have not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> those who seek <S%H1875>you.<s%>
Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H5046>declare<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> what he has <S%H5949>done.<s%>
For he who <S%H1875>avenges<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H2142>remembers<s%> <S%H7911>them.<s%> He doesn't forget the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H6035>afflicted.<s%>

Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh. <S%H7200>See<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction<s%> by those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7311>me,<s%> and lift me up from the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death;<s%>

that I may show <S%H5608>forth<s%> all your <S%H8416>praise.<s%> In the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> I will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> have sunk <S%H2883>down<s%> in the <S%H7845>pit<s%> that they <S%H6213>made.<s%> In the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2098>which<s%> they <S%H2934>hid,<s%> their own <S%H7272>foot<s%> is <S%H3920>taken.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has made himself <S%H3045>known.<s%> He has <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%> The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5367>snared<s%> by the <S%H6467>work<s%> of his own <S%H3709>hands.<s%> <S%H1902>Meditation.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be <S%H7725>turned<s%> back to <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> even all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H7913>forget<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
For the <S%H34>needy<s%> shall not <S%H5331>always<s%> be <S%H7911>forgotten,<s%> nor the <S%H8615>hope<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%>
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H582>Don't<s%> let man <S%H5810>prevail.<s%> Let the <S%H1471>nations<s%> be <S%H8199>judged<s%> in your <S%H6440>sight.<s%>
<S%H7896>Put<s%> them in <S%H4172>fear,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Let the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that they are only <S%H582>men.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
